name: rspcef
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), w0), wrex(s0, c1, w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), w0), wrex(s0, c1, w1))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wnfc(s0, c0)
-| wnfc(s0, c1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), w0), wrex(s0, c1, w1))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wnfc(s0, c0)
-| wnfc(s0, c1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))

comment: Restricted existential specialization, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 24-Dec-2020.)
